title: Aarariraro Song Lyrics Ram
stanzas:
aarariraaro
naan ingu paada
thaaye nee kan urangu
ennoda madi sainthu

vaazhum kaalam yaavume
thaayin paadham sorgame
vedham naangum sonnathe
athai naan arivaene

amma ennum manthirame
agilam yaavum aalgirathe
aarariraaro ..

vaer illadha maram pol ennai
nee boomiyil nattaaye
oor kann enthan melae pattal
unn uyir noga thudithaaye

ulagathin bandhangal ellam
nee solli thandhaaye
pirapukkum irapukkum idaiyil
vazhi nadathi sendraaye

unakke orr thottil katti
naane thaayaai
maarida vendum
aarariraaro ..

thaai solkindra
vaarthaigal yellam
noi theerkindra marunthallava
man pon melae aasai thurandha
kann thoongatha uyir allava

kaalathin kanakkukalil
selavaagum varavum nee
suzhalkindra boomiyil melae
suzhalaadha boomiyum nee

iraivaa nee aanai idu
thaaye endhan magalai maara

aarariraaro
naan ingu paada
thaaye nee kan urangu
ennoda madi sainthu

seo.title: Aarariraro Song Lyrics Ram
seo.description: Aarariraro Song Lyrics Ram - Tamil song lyrics from Ram
